FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: Thanks for these wonderful flowers. I love them. They are so beautiful.conversation

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: Of course! I was looking forward to this the whole day. I am so hungry.conversation

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: Awesome! It's dinner time. Let's see what's on the platter. I think you are going to love it.conversation

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: Heeey! That's a picture of you!conversation

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: Ha! I guess I am on the menu. Well, it's time to get busy. Go on now.conversation

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: That was good! I enjoyed it, and you earned party tickets. This party is only 2 tickets. Other parties will cost more.conversation

FullDialogue.speaker: Kitty
FullDialogue.conversation: Yay!!! That was fun, and it totally hit the spot!conversation

FullDialogue.speaker: Amber
FullDialogue.conversation: It is a themed party. Come back in a costume and we will have even more fun.conversation
